title: Bai Bian Ke Xiao Bi
synopsis: May knowledge empower children with ever-changing power! In the beautiful robot town, every time the magical Kobei scans a book, he can transform into a character in the book and have the corresponding ability to solve the problems encountered in life for his friends and crack Xiaopi Xiaochao. The prank. The film is lively, entertaining and entertaining. It allows children to recognize the characteristics of various animals and plants, vehicles, daily necessities, etc., and answer the 100,000 whys in children's lives, and help parents! (translated from iqiyi)
